The last time I tried doing that though and it worked I was 19. Don't know if it would work now or if I'll be just more exhausted.
4:10 am and I'm wide awake. Pondering staying awake until tomorrow night to reset my sleep pattern. 😐
@jatosha @Wanderlustin Ahh ten years ago I knew the guy who made that, and now he's super successful. I'mNotJealousI'mNotJealous 🤥

I wonder if the American evangelicals know they're being played by Trump, or they don't care cause he'll get them what they want.

Australia needs new friends.

They were like a chat room (or many linked chat rooms) with d&d game mechanics built in.
Well, type, since MUDs were text, but I suppose they were more social than some modern multiplayer games in that communicating was required.
Thinking about how you ~can~ play Overwatch with ppl online and not speak to them, but in the MUDs I played, you *had* to speak to ppl.
@hoskingc Have you read the book Underground? It's really interesting. It's about the hacking scene in the 80s. https://t.co/vd4VopBgb8

@Acccent @SilverSober Oh! A Star Wars reference! (I think)
@Acccent @SilverSober Don't eat the fish, it's... poisson! (sorry, I've just discovered a list of bad French/English puns)
@Acccent @SilverSober Japanese dads must have so many chances to make dad jokes in their language :s
@Acccent @SilverSober *googles* Ahh, I get it now, hah. I was reading that Japanese is full of puns as there's so many homophones....
@Acccent @SilverSober That said, everything sounds sexier in French. Such as "la poubelle" compared to "the rubbish bin" :p
@Acccent @SilverSober yeah, I'm not sure that cheesy pick up lines work in any language anyway.
@Acccent @SilverSober heh, yeah that's what I thought.
@SilverSober @Acccent Ahh hah, of course. You can get away with being cheesy if it's in French :p
